instructions.name: emergency_access_update
docs: Bypasses the timelock for emergency updates on access control rules. Allowed operations:

instructions.name: link_unlink_mint_by_mint_authority
docs: For glam mint program's use only

instructions.name: reset_priced_protocols_by_mint_authority
docs: For glam mint program's use only

instructions.name: system_transfer
docs: Transfers SOL from the vault to another account.
Token program ID is required as a remaining account when wrapping SOL (i.e., transfer to wSOL token account).

instructions.name: token_transfer_checked_by_mint_authority
docs: For glam mint program's use only

instructions.name: update_mint_params_by_mint_authority
docs: For glam mint program's use only, timelock is not enforced

errors.name: CannotApplyChanges
errors.msg: Pending changes cannot be applied due to unfulfilled requests

errors.name: AssetNotBorrowable
errors.msg: Asset is not allowed to borrow

errors.name: UnexpectedProgramOwner
errors.msg: Account is owned by an unexpected program

errors.name: CannotCloseState
errors.msg: Glam state cannot be closed: mint must be closed and state must be disabled

errors.name: InvalidRemainingAccounts
errors.msg: Invalid accounts: the transaction is malformed

errors.name: MissingAccount
errors.msg: An account required by the instruction is missing

errors.name: WithdrawDenied
errors.msg: Withdraw denied. Only vaults allow withdraws (funds and mints don't)

errors.name: InvalidStableCoinPriceForSubscribe
errors.msg: Subscription not allowed: invalid stable coin price

errors.name: ExternalPositionsNotPriced
errors.msg: Not all external vault accounts are priced

errors.name: VaultTokensNotPriced
errors.msg: Not all vault tokens are priced

errors.name: InvalidQuoteSpotMarket
errors.msg: Unsupported spot market for perp quotes

errors.name: LockUp
errors.msg: Policy violation: lock-up has not expired

types.name: IntegrationAcl
docs: An integration program can have multiple protocols supported.
Enabled protocols are stored in a bitmask, and each protocol can have its own policy.

types.name: IntegrationPermissions
docs: Stores delegate permissions for an integration program.

types.name: OracleConfigs
docs: Vault-specific oracle configs. If available, these configs are preferred over the global config.

types.name: ProtocolPermissions
docs: Represents a delegate's permissions for a specific protocol

types.name: ProtocolPolicy
docs: Stores policy data for an integrated protocol.
